subject: Re: [junit] correct order of tests
msgSnippet: So said  Dave Astels  on  2002-11-07 ... I think that we were afraid to ask, Dave. :) This is why when people learn JUnit, they should learn how to put a test
messageBody:
So said Dave Astels on 2002-11-07

>On Thu, 2002-11-07 at 04:44, Wolfgang Egger wrote:
>
>> Unfortunatley the TestProcedures have to be performed in a certain
>> order. By default this is not ensured by the JUnit-framwork.
>
>Nobody's asked yet.. but why do you need them in a specific order?

I think that we were afraid to ask, Dave. :)

This is why when people learn JUnit, they should learn how to put a
test suite together "by hand" first, and realize that the test runner
is actually just automating some of what would otherwise be their work.
It's a little thing, but important.

J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
